Uses of Interface
org.fluidity.foundation.Command.Job

  • Packages that use Command.Job 
    Package Description
    org.fluidity.composition.spi
    Service provider interfaces to handle special cases of software composition in Fluid Tools.
    org.fluidity.features
    Fluid Tools features that are independent of the main Fluid Tools functionality.
    org.fluidity.testing
    Utilities to simplify unit testing with EasyMock.

    • Uses of Command.Job in org.fluidity.composition.spi

      Methods in org.fluidity.composition.spi with parameters of type Command.Job 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ContainerTermination.add(Command.Job<Exception> job)
      Adds a job to be execute when the application is shut down.
      void ContainerTermination.Jobs.add(Command.Job<Exception> job)
      Adds a job to the list.
      void ContainerTermination.remove(Command.Job<Exception> job)
      Undoes a previous call to ContainerTermination.add(Command.Job) with the same job.
      void ContainerTermination.Jobs.remove(Command.Job<Exception> job)
      Removes a job from the list.
